column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Jinya is by far one of my top 5 favorite restaurants in all of Houston. It is both vegan and vegetarian friendly. My go to dish is the Spicy Creamy Vegan Ramen with added garlic and brussels sprouts
column2: yum! If you go at a popular time
column4: but it goes by fast and you can grab a drink at the bar while you're waiting. Service is friendly and fast. Parking is available around the corner in a free parking garage.
